SEARCH
Package RaccoonRush.map.tile

Class Item

java.lang.Object
RaccoonRush.map.tile.Tile
RaccoonRush.map.tile.Item
public class Item extends Tile
Item class is a subclass of Tile class. It is used to create items that the player can collect. It has a score value and a boolean to check if it has been collected.
